dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2795399P] Unauthorized use of Water Inc. at http://www.livingwaterin
dmca.body:
t -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2007 7:34 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2795399P] Unauthorized use of Water Inc. at http://www.livingwaterinc.com/index.htm [IFID:KRRXT] ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Unauthorized use of Water Inc. at http://www.livingwaterinc.com/index.htm [IFID:KRRXT] Added by system at Tuesday, Jan 30 2007 02:11 pm X-MailFrom: administrator-106@legal-notification.com X-RcptTo: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Jan 30 14:11:03 2007 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 30 Jan 2007 14:10:22 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Tue, 30 Jan 2007 14:10:22 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from administrator-106@legal-notification.com) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HBzJ8-0002hP-3G for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 30 Jan 2007 14:10:22 -0600 Received: from mail.legal-notification.com ([216.183.91.22] helo=thejimburkefamily.com) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from administrator-106@legal-notification.com) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HBzJ6-0005Eo-RC for abuse@theplanet.com; Tue, 30 Jan 2007 14:10:20 -0600 Received: from BDWEBSVR1 ([10.1.1.23]) by thejimburkefamily.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 30 Jan 2007 15:10:18 -0500 Reply-To: "Legal Administrator" From: "Legal Administrator" To: Subject: Unauthorized use of Water Inc. at http://www.livingwaterinc.com/index.htm [IFID:KRRXT] Date: Tue, 30 Jan 2007 15:10:10 -0500 Message-ID: <009c01c744aa$a4aed9c0$1701010a@affsys.com> MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_009D_01C74480.BBD8D1C0" X-Mailer: Microsoft CDO for Windows 2000 Thread-Index: AcdEqqSuX0EKxWO1QCeGypdZ69K27A== Content-Class: urn:content-classes:message X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2800.1807 X-OriginalArrivalTime: 30 Jan 2007 20:10:18.0722 (UTC) FILETIME=[A9CC5C20:01C744AA] (multipart/alternative) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. MIME element (text/plain) Dear Administrative Contact: I am writing to advise you that you are hosting a site at http://www.livingwaterinc.com/index.htm that contains a trademark violation for my client, Water, inc, a company based in Carson, California, USA. Water, inc. is the owner of the Everhot ®, Evercold®, Everbrew®, Enviropure®, Navinet® and Water, inc ® trademarks and associated domain names. I have attempted to remove this infraction by delivering two notifications of Cease and Desist to the e-mail of record however the domain owner refuses to remove the infraction. The domain owner of this site is deliberately trying to cause customer confusion by using Water, inc.'s trademarks to divert web traffic away from Water, inc's website at www.waterinc.com. This action constitutes trademark infringement and unfair competition. I am therefore asking for your assistance in having the domain owner remove all references to Water, inc.'s trademarks from their site. I truly appreciate your co-operation in this matter and hope to hear from you at your earliest convenience. Sincerely, Trademark Department Water, inc. Legal Administrator [IFID:KRRXT] MIME element (text/html)
Dear Administrative Contact:

I am writing to advise you that you are hosting a site at http://www.livingwaterinc.com/index.htm that contains a trademark violation for my client, Water, inc, a company based in Carson, California, USA. Water, inc. is the owner of the Everhot ®, Evercold®, Everbrew®, Enviropure®, Navinet® and Water, inc ® trademarks and associated domain names. I have attempted to remove this infraction by delivering two notifications of Cease and Desist to the e-mail of record however the domain owner refuses to remove the infraction.

The domain owner of this site is deliberately trying to cause customer confusion by using Water, inc.'s trademarks to divert web traffic away from Water, inc's website at www.waterinc.com. This action constitutes trademark infringement and unfair competition. I am therefore asking for your assistance in having the domain owner remove all references to Water, inc.'s trademarks from their site. I truly appreciate your co-operation in this matter and hope to hear from you at your earliest convenience.

Sincerely,


Trademark Department
Water, inc.
Legal Administrator <administrator-106@legal-notification.com>
[IFID:KRRXT]
MIME element (text/plain)
